name: Smoky Baked Chicken
author: Desirae Perkins
summary: This dish is like Alice Springs Chicken on steroids. Mixing everything together gives it a much better, juicier flavor. I like to pair it with steamed veggies.
ingredients: ½ (8 ounce) package shredded Mexican cheese blend
1 ½ teaspoons chipotle-flavored hot sauce (such as Tabasco® Chipotle Pepper Sauce)
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line a baking dish with aluminum foil; brush with olive oil
Season chicken breasts with mesquite seasoning and place in the prepared baking dish
Mix cheese blend, bacon bits, green onions, mayonnaise, and chipotle-flavored hot sauce together in a small bowl
Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the center and an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center reads at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C), about 16 minutes
Turn off oven; leave chicken inside for 2 minutes
Turn on broiler; broil chicken on low until topping is golden, 2 to 3 minutes
